column1: [[Image:The Tolkien art of the Brothers Hildebrandt 2006 Calendar.jpg

'''The Tolkien art of the Brothers Hildebrandt 2006 Calendar''' was published by Ronnie Sellers and is the fourth of a series of four calendars that features original Tolkien artwork by the [[Brothers Hildebrandt]]. The sketches and photos featured were created from posing sessions during the 1970's.
